{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

print_hello[source]

print_hello(to)

Print hello to the user

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Some examples

{% raw %} 
print_hello("Alina")

'Hello, Alina!'
{% endraw %}

Some tests

{% raw %} 
assert print_hello("Alina") == 'Hello, Alina!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert print_hello(1) == f'Hello, {1}!'
{% endraw %}
